product_name: Bison Designs BukaLite Quick Clip Keychain - White
long_description: The Bison Designs BukaLite Quick Clip keychain makes it easy to attach and separate-and illuminate-your keys with a quick-release buckle and bright white LED light. Durable webbing and carabiner-style clip stand up to rugged outdoor use.
short_description: The Bison Designs BukaLite Quick Clip keychain makes it easy to attach and separate-and illuminate-your keys with a quick-release buckle and bright white LED light.
